title: Item Sets
body: Soo basically my friend when he wants to drag an item to his item sets it just doesnt go in plz fix this glitch

replies.body:
If your friend is using a mac running macOS 10.12 Sierra this is a *known issue* that has no fix at the moment. Your friend can make changes on another computer **not running** macOS 10.12 and those Item Set changes should be seen on their Mac, since they are saved to the server.

Let me know if you have any questions.
There is a issue with players on Mac OS that breaks item sets.

Can he make a gif of it? Try downloading Gyazo to do it.

https://i.gyazo.com/16b7dbc30080555cf5eb562b0a7bd093.gif
